channel.title: Posts on Val's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Val's Notes

item.title: My Journey on Getting Certified As Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer From Zero
item.description: So, you want to be a Google-certified data engineer? Over the last several months I have been taking courses and doing hands-on labs to learn Google Cloud Platform for data engineering.

item.title: Solo Hike Tangkuban Perahu via CIC - Sukawana (Include GPX)
item.description: Bagi orang yang tinggal di Bandung dan sekitarnya, gunung Tangkuban Perahu merupakan salah satu destinasi wisata favorit. Khususnya, pelancong dapat dengan mudah menikmati keindahan view kawah Domas dengan hanya sedikit berjalan saja dari parkiran bila melalui gerbang resmi di dekat perbatasan Lembang - Subang.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello! This will be my new blog. I build this with Hugo Framework, so I can focus less on web development and more on the content. Well, let’s see then!
